'''Instructions''' are one of the types of '''Crafting Blueprints''' and are similar to [[recipe]]s, but are used for [[alchemy]]. Once used, the player will learn to make the associated [[Gadgets|gadget]].

Instructions are earned through the [[reputation]] system and were introduced with it. The instructions' quality is equal to the craftable item's quality.
